Summary: kinda went to side of hill then looked up into a bright light coming from top of trees
divs: Sighting Detailswhat brought this back to me is your wallpaper their out their I was camping with my buds not one of them ever said anything to me and we had a cple but I rember the trees and this light that came from the top of the trees this light was fixed on me the more i think about it the less i rember but i do get flashes of the tree and that light coming from the top of the tree i just rember that image with out the ets in it just alight on the top of a tree and i find it creepy I thought one of my freinds was inthe tree at the top pionting a flash light at me a flsh light beam coming from the top of a tree the object was stationary my feeling was i was scarded and i keep coming back to this piont in time the reason why im telling u this is that the 2nd image caught my attion if u r doing some type of study this one struck a nerve I reported this once before and some one called me and i kinda down played it plus it was my daughter bd and I had compnay over I nvr heard from him again I have no evedice or proof just a messed up memory but what i do know is I dont like the second wallpaper and I dont have any memories of ets in the wall paper just a light coming from the top a tree like a helicopter without the wind effect or noise
